select c.user_id, c.user_account userAccount, c.receiver userName, c.create_at, a.area, a.expire_at, e.user_id superiorUser, e.user_account superiorUserAccount, e.receiver superiorUserName, c.total from -- 地区表 (select czb_vip_area_config.area,DATE_ADD(max(czb_vip_recharge_records.create_at),INTERVAL 1 YEAR) expire_at,czb_vip_recharge_records.user_id from czb_vip_area_config -- 地区配置表 join czb_vip_recharge_records on czb_vip_area_config.vip_area_config_id = czb_vip_recharge_records.vip_area_config_id group by czb_vip_recharge_records.user_id,czb_vip_area_config.area ) a -- 充值记录表 right join -- 用户表 (select czb_user.user_id,czb_user.user_account,czb_address.receiver,czb_user.create_at,czb_user.superior_user,czb_user.is_vip,price.total from czb_user left outer join (select d.buyer_id,sum(d.current_price) as total from czb_petrol_sales_records d group by buyer_id) as price on czb_user.user_id = price. buyer_id left join czb_address on czb_user.user_id = czb_address.user_id
partner = 0
and czb_user.user_account like concat('%',#{account},'%')
and czb_user.create_at like concat('%',#{createAt},'%')
and czb_user.is_vip like concat('%',#{isVip},'%')
group by czb_user.user_id,czb_user.user_account,czb_address.receiver,czb_user.create_at,czb_user.superior_user,czb_user.is_vip,price.total order by price.total desc) c on a.user_id = c.user_id -- 推荐人表 left outer join (select czb_user.user_account,czb_user.user_id,czb_address.receiver from czb_address join czb_user on czb_user.user_id = czb_address.user_id group by czb_user.user_id,czb_user.user_account,czb_address.receiver )e on e.user_id = c.superior_user
and a.area like concat('%',#{area},'%')
and e.user_account like concat('%',#{superiorUserAccount},'%')
group by c.user_id,c.user_account,a.area,c.receiver,c.create_at,a.expire_at,e.user_id,e.user_account,e.receiver,c.total order by c.total desc
